title: Which serif typeface to use which will complement Helvetica?
content: Does anyone have any advice on which serif typeface I could use as body text to compliment Helvetica? The article is all about Helvetica. All headings etc will be in Helvetica. I was thinking of using a serif typeface that was created around the time Helvetica was created in the 1950's. Or can anyone suggest some other ideas? Thanks for any advice.
author: Melbro

comments.content: [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20120104164345/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0118) Text Pro would be an option, but it will depend on your measure really.
